table, tr, td, th taglari bilan

position: absolute va relative farqi nima?

variants.text: absolute o'z joyiga nisbatan, relative ota elementga nisbatan
relative o'z joyiga nisbatan, absolute ota elementga nisbatan
Video va audio fayllarni qo'shish uchun
hover bosishda, focus ustiga olib borishda
hover ustiga olib borishda, focus kursor tushganda
Sahifaga dinamiklik qo'shish uchun dasturlash tili
let o'zgarmas, const o'zgaradi, var blok doirasi
let blok doirasi, const o'zgarmas, var funksiya doirasi
== faqat qiymat, === qiymat va turni ham tekshiradi
